title: Sobre proxima season: Invisibilidad es la nueva "onda"
body:
> > All of the details are not sorted out just yet, but 1 big change that will significantly impact Stealth champions is that “Pink Wards” will no longer detect Invisibility next Pre-Season. Simply put, Invisibility being trivially countered by the use of a relatively cheap single consumable item rendered several champions non-functional especially at high levels of play

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/MrdMGLpj-assassins-pre-season-class-update-systems-tweaks-and-smaller-scale-updates

A grandes rasgos, estara la invisibilidad y el camuflaje:

Invisibilidad: Periodos cortos
Camuflaje: Periodos largos o permanentes

Los pinks NO mostraran casos de invisibilidad (Vayne con ulti y Q, K6 y su salto, Akali y su W). Se viene el ataque de las main vayne!!!
